review: Absolutely fantastic device.  We got rid of our Dish Network and just use the Firestick and the apps you can download.  Using SlingTV, Netflix and Hulu I'm only paying $40 a month as compared to $104 with Dish and all of their channels I didn't use.  My kids love that they can go to their favorite shows at the push of a button rather than wait for a certain time for them to come on and their is more content then OnDemand.  My wife loves Netflix documentaries and I'm a fan of their original TV shows.  No more cable or Satellite for me.  And the picture quality is very sharp coming from this littler bugger.  Give the Firestick a try and also try the apps with free trials to see how you would like it.
